title: COMMUNITY EVENTS
intro:
Check out Bawky Studio's interactive experimental events!
Where data meets play and your choices become statistics.

avgNumber.title: Guess the Average
avgNumber.desc:
Two winners will be decided in one event.
1: The player closest to the overall average
2: The player who picked the lowest unique number
Both results are automatically calculated and revealed to everyone.

mystery.title: Mystery
mystery.desc: Stay tuned for the next experimental event!
